name: joi smart sense
description:
Digital signage with AI multifunction kiosk.

Product Features:
• Face recognition system with artificial intelligence to analyse customer information. Curate content with effective and relevant marketing advertisement.
• Contactless temperature screening in various scenario detection. Suitable placement for indoor and outdoor.
• Touchless motion gesture by detect and recognise user hand movements and control without physical contact.
• Real-time monitoring in backend dashboard with precise data analysis and management.

Product Specifications:
• Operating System: Windows 10
• Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-11500U processor
• Graphics: Intel® UHD Graphics
• Display: 39.5" FHD (1920x1080), 21.5" (Upper Screen)
• RAM: 16GB RAM
• Storage: 256GB
• 4G LTE, Wi-Fi Connectivity, Bluetooth Available
• Camera: 2.0 HD Camera


Supports:
• USB 2.0 ports x2
• USB 3.0 x2
• VGA port x1
• HDMI™ output port x1
• Microphone jack x1
• RJ-45 LAN port x1
• DC-in jack x1
